channel.title: Really annoying bug ><
channel.description: Every time I use an object (ladder, door, etc) or attack anything it does it before I get to it. Like if I click on a ladder 10 feet away it climbs it where I'm standing and that's really annoying. How do I fix this?

Kitno plz shut up aaa803 has been here longer he has changed his name several times! join date doesnt matter stop whining and grow up act like a grown up and dont try to have the last word all the time.

what aaa803 was right and il fill it in specifiec because we dont want a flame war to start

search for

case 132: int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); int face = 0; int face2 = 0; int GateID = 1;

under that u add

else if(objectID == OBJECTID HERE) { destinationRange = HOW MANY STEPS AWAY; //A Number from 1 to infinity }
